Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
GameMap
public class GameMap extends Object
GameMap is a class that contains the game's map and several related functions:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameMap

      public GameMap(String mapName, int numGoldRequired, ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> mapList)
      Constructor for GameMap class.
      Parameters:
      mapName - Name of map parsed from map file.
      numGoldRequired - Amount of gold required to win, parsed from map file.
      mapList - List that holds the map's tiles. Read from map file. Stored as nested array of strings.

  • Method Details

    • checkTile

      public boolean checkTile(HashMap<String,Integer> coordinates)
      Checks the given tile for gold and walls as the player can not spawn on them tiles
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates to check
      Returns:
      Returns whether it is valid to spawn on the given coordinates. True is not allowed. False is allowed.

    • checkTile

      public boolean checkTile(HashMap<String,Integer> coordinates, String whichTile)
      Checks the given tile for the given character.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates to check.
      whichTile - String to check for on the tile.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the given string matches the tile at the coordinates

    • consumeTile

      public void consumeTile(HashMap<String,Integer> tileCoordinates)
      Used to replace a tile with empty. This is done when a tile such as gold is "consumed" and has to become a normal tile
      Parameters:
      tileCoordinates - Coordinates of the tile to consume

    • getMap

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getMap()
      Gets the map and returns it.
      Returns:
      Nested array of strings containing the map

    • getNumGoldRequired

      public int getNumGoldRequired()
      Gets the amount of gold required to win and returns it.
      Returns:
      integer containing amount of gold required to win.
